name: Wario Pill's Pill-Based Journey! 2: The Next Dosage!
name_original: Wario Pill's Pill-Based Journey! 2: The Next Dosage!
description:
DISCLAIMER:

This game may cause seizures. Please beware and don't die.

Wario Pill is sent to a place where Happyweeds feeling different emotions exist, however these ones are hostile and he figured out that he can shoot them using the Happyweeds he had already gathered. When he got done shooting the Unhappyweeds, it turns out that the evil Mario Pill is back at it again, and this time he has even more henchmen to come after you! Can Wario Pill stop Mario Pill and figure out why there are other Emotionweeds?

Controls:

WASD Keys

Use the Mouse to shoot stuffs

NG Version: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/810571
